mapper.select: select i.no no, i.code code, c.code as client_code, i.name, i.in_price, i.out_price, i.image from item i inner join client c on i.client_no=c.no
mapper.update: update item set client_no=#{client_no}, code=#{code}, name=#{name}, in_price=#{in_price}, out_pirce=#{out_price}, image=#{image} where no=#{no}
